alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Coffee; Rutherford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 11:51AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Rutherford, western Coffee and Bedford Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1151 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Shelbyville to near Fayetteville. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Shelbyville, Manchester, Tullahoma, Wartrace, Bell Buckle, Normandy, Christiana, Raus, Beechgrove, Fosterville, Deason, Rockvale and Arnold AFB. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 82 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
